entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING, Val-d'Or
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:44 a.m. EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High zero.

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy. Temperature falling to minus 11 in the afternoon.
